edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.specs

Class OnlineProtocolP1

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.specs.OnlineProtocolP1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Protocol

    public class OnlineProtocolP1
extends java.lang.Object
implements Protocol
    This class represents the first party in the online phase of Malicious Yao protocol.

    The full protocol specification is described in "Blazing Fast 2PC in the "Offline/Online Setting with Security for Malicious Adversaries" paper by Yehuda Lindell and Ben Riva, page 20 - FIGURE E.3 (The Online Stage).

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)

    • Constructor Detail

      • OnlineProtocolP1

        public OnlineProtocolP1(ExecutionParameters mainExecution,
                        ExecutionParameters crExecution,
                        CryptoPrimitives primitives,
                        CommunicationConfig communication,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Bundle> mainBucket,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Bundle> crBucket)
        A constructor that sets the given parameters and initializes some inline members.
        Parameters:
        mainExecution - Contains some parameters regarding the execution of the main circuits.
        crExecution - Contains some parameters regarding the execution of the cheating recovery circuits.
        primitives - Contains some primitives object to use during the protocol.
        communication - Configuration of communication between parties.
        mainBucket - Contain the main circuits (for ex. AES).
        crBucket - Contain the cheating recovery circuits.

      • start

        public void start(ProtocolInput protocolInput)
        Sets the input for the protocol.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        protocolInput - The input for the circuit.

      • run

        public void run()
        Executes the first side of the online protocol.

        basically, it computes the main circuit and than the cheating recovery circuit.

        Specified by:
        run in interface Protocol

      • getOutput

        public ProtocolOutput getOutput()
        Party one in the online protocol has no output. Return null.
        Specified by:
        getOutput in interface Protocol
